description: [VersaMem](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1154) hooked and overrided Versa's built-in authentication method, `setUserPassword`, to intercept plaintext credentials when submitted to the server.(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2024, August 27). Taking The Crossroads: The Versa Director Zero-Day Exploitaiton. Retrieved August 27, 2024.
